Title: Unnatural Disasters
Plot: Andy Schillinger arrives to Oz and Vern tries to get Warden Glynn to move Andy in with him. McManus is sued for sexual harassment. Sister Pete has questions after a session with Keller. Miguel gets a directive from Hernandez. Said gets old wounds opened when his sister visits. Ryan scores another victory. Officer Hughes makes a "stunning" move on an inmate and Richie Hanlon's death sentence is overturned.
ParentalRatingReason: Violence, sexual violence, drug use & offensive language
GuestStars: Enid Graham, Oni Faida Lampley, William Cote, Kevin Geer, Fred Koehler, Bruce MacVittie, Rob Bogue
